name: Umhverfisstofnun Office Renovation
subtitle: First Nordic Swan certified renovation in ALL Nordic countries - 94.4% waste sorting

executive_summary.headline: Nordic-first: 94.4% waste sorting in renovation meeting Nordic Swan's strictest criteria
key_achievements: First Nordic Swan certified renovation in all Nordic countries (NO, SE, DK, FI, IS)
94.4% construction waste sorting rate (vs 70% EU requirement)
Aluminum window/door frames reused in place
Cork tiles preserved from original interior
All paints/sealants Nordic Swan certified (no GHS-classified hazardous substances)
executive_summary.why_tier2: Renovation project demonstrating certification-driven circular approach. CO2 reduction not quantified but 94.4% waste sorting and 85% preservation are strong indicators. Limited material innovation compared to flagships.

materials.description: Window and door frames reused in place - cleaned and resealed
materials.processing: Cleaned and resealed rather than replaced

materials.description: Cork tiles preserved from original 2002 interior
All new paints/sealants Nordic Swan certified - no hazardous substances

certifications.name: Nordic Swan Ecolabel
certifications.significance: First Nordic Swan certified renovation in all Nordic countries

key_insights: 94.4% waste sorting achievable through selective dismantling
Early Nordic Swan criteria integration from design phase critical
Digital material logging (O20 requirement) enables long-term tracking
Public sector renovation can achieve higher circularity than many new builds
challenges: Meeting preservation goals AND stringent Nordic Swan chemical requirements
Risk assessment needed for reused materials (asbestos, PCBs testing)

narrative.driver: Environment Agency demonstrating sustainability leadership through first Nordic Swan renovation.
narrative.approach: Aggressive preservation: aluminum frames reused, cork preserved. All new materials Nordic Swan certified. 94.4% waste sorting through selective dismantling.
narrative.significance: First Nordic Swan renovation in all Nordic countries. Proves renovation certification achievable.
narrative.legacy: Template for Nordic Swan renovation criteria application.
